name: Urgent Neko Parcel
description:
When Kirara is your active character, after you switch characters: Deal 1 Dendro DMG and draw 1 card.
Usage(s): 1 (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When Kirara is your active character, after you switch characters:</color> Deal 1 $[K107] and draw 1 card.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 1</color> (Can stack. Max 2 stacks.)
